doc:
Clarence Handyside https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clarence_Handyside 0 Clarence Handyside (April 28, 1854 – December 20, 1931) was an American actor. Handyside was born in 1854 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as Clarence Auckland Handyside. Handyside's acting debut came in Canada when he was 21 years old. He was known for His Picture in the Papers (1916), Silks and Satins (1916) and Mice and Men (1916). He was married to Blanche Sharp and Kate D. Baker. Handyside died on December 20, 1931 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.. He was survived by his wife. Clarence_Handyside ( April_28_,_1854 – December_20_,_1931 ) was an_American_actor . Handyside was_born in 1854 in Montreal , Quebec , Canada , as Clarence_Auckland_Handyside . Handyside 's_acting_debut came in Canada when he was 21_years old . He was_known for His_Picture in the_Papers_(_1916_)_,_Silks_and_Satins_(_1916_)_and_Mice and Men_(_1916_) . He was_married to Blanche_Sharp and Kate_D._Baker . Handyside died on December_20_,_1931 in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania . . He was_survived by his_wife .
